snippet: Katie Douglas scored 24 points and Erlana Larkins had 16 points and 20 rebounds to help the host Indiana Fever beat the Atlanta Dream and advance to the Eastern Conference finals.
abstract: Indiana Fever defeat Atlanta Dream, 75-64, to advance to the WNBA Eastern Conference finals.
lead_paragraph: Katie Douglas scored 24 points and Erlana Larkins had 16 points and 20 rebounds to help the host Indiana Fever beat the Atlanta Dream and advance to the Eastern Conference finals.

headline.seo: Fever Beat Dream to Advance to W.N.B.A. Conference Finals
headline.main: Fever Beat Dream to Advance to W.N.B.A. Conference Finals
